Click Energy

April 13, 2025 Tags: Hypercasual
Click Energy is a fast-paced casual game where every second counts! Tap on the appearing objects as quickly as possible &mdash; but watch out for the red ones! Miss too many or click the wrong one, and it&rsquo;s game over. How many can you catch before time runs out?
